Name: Punch Back
Ingredients: 45 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
22.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge on rim with cherries on stick .
Review: Cachaça is the raw, spirity love interest in this rum based coconut and lime punch.
History: Created in May 2013 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England for the National Aids Trust.
Nutrition: One serving of Punch Back contains 253 calories
